title: FriendZi
info: IMPORTANT: Server is hosted on Render.com free plan, so initial connecting is a bit slower. Should be something like a dating app, but for making friends, when finished. You create an account, book events and later converse with people that are in your event room.

title: Pop Star Studio
info: IMPORTANT: Server is hosted on Render.com free plan, so initial connecting is a bit slower. Website I made for a firend. You can become a member(create an account) or just listen to some music. Also there is a language selector. For now it is just an embeded YouTube 24/7 live stream, but later on there will be music of his own.

title: Login Form
info: IMPORTANT: Server is hosted on Render.com free plan, so initial connecting is a bit slower. Simple login form with hashed passwords and authentication token made using React for frontend and Node.js for backend. For database i used MongoDB.

title: 十面埋伏
info: Game made for DESKTOP(prefered resolution 1920x1080). Also you need a keyboard to be able to play.. I made this in collaboration with a friend who is currently in Sky-music studying to become a sound technician. He provides the sounds and i provide the code.

title: Battle Realms
info: Tribute page to one of my top two childhood video games.
